successes.title: Reaper Miniatures Bones 3: The Search for Mr. Bones!
successes.description: You can still back this project by using the link to the Reaper Pledge Manager below.Â  See update 50 for more details.

Pledges.description: THANK YOU! (WAVE 3 SHIPPING) This reward level will get your foot in the door. It's perfect if you just want a few add-ons and not the whole Core Set. Free Shipping for US Customers. International Customers will pay Actual Shipping costs. This level ships with Wave 3.
